DOC.HEADLINE: PACIFIC WATCH : CHINA
DOC.TEXT: Dip in Inflation Reported : Inflation in the nation ' s 35 largest cities eased to 23.3 % in January compared to the year-earlier period , down from 23.9 % in December , the official China News Service reported . Annual growth in retail sales slowed to 22 % in January after a 35.2 % increase in December , the agency said .
